issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
same issue : https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/MAPREDUCE-3056

which is created on 2011.09.21 and fixed 2011.10.04 
there is user(Sergey) who has same issue on 2015.05.13 too! (look last comment of above link)

on beeline prompt, 
I've tried import hive table from parquet files that are exported from another hive table
but there was no "job.splitmetainfo" file on staging directory. So FileNotFoundException occurs

I tried with yarn user, hdfs user with different permissions and directory ownership, but nothing changed.

full log messages below

==================

Log Type: syslog
Log Upload Time: Wed Jul 20 17:57:36 +0900 2016
Log Length: 21439

fields.summary: import hive table from parquet files, there is no 'job.splitmetainfo' file message
